short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic flip clock on your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab into a sleek, futuristic flip-style clock! Inspired by the iconic airport departure boards, this minimalistic and elegant extension brings a dynamic, real-time clock to your screen, featuring smooth animations. Each digit flips only when it changes, creating a subtle and visually satisfying transition.
